item.title: Shadow DOM vs Virtual DOM
item.description: DOM, Die Or March ? :P DOM(Document Object Model), is literally a structured model by objects. In other words, DOM represents the web-page (documents) by object-oriented. Web browsers handle the DOM, and we can interact with it using Javascript and CSS.
